column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Breanna - Thank you for your review. I have often said that JINYA ramen will never be all things to all people
column2: and personal taste and palates are very subjective
column3: but for every critique we receive that states we lack authenticity
column4: I could argue we have a matching review that states the contrary. Nevertheless
column5: I am glad you still considered our ramen good enough for a positive review
column6: and for that I am extremely grateful. We hope to have the privilege of serving you again in the future.
